languages.text: "Значит, родись я минутой раньше, и живым мертвецом перед вами сегодня стоял бы я?" {n}Парень отшатывается от родителей.{/n} "Но почему она ничего не помнит... Почему ей не рассказали?!"

traits.locale_text: "Значит, родись я минутой раньше, и живым мертвецом перед вами сегодня стоял бы я?" {n}Парень отшатывается от родителей.{/n} "Почему я ничего не помню? О детстве на флагмане и о сестре, с которой делил материнскую утробу?"

languages.text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, родись я минутой раньше, и живым мертвецом перед вами сегодня стоял бы я?" {n}Парень отшатывается от родителей.{/n} "Но почему она ничего не помнит... Почему ей не рассказали?!"

traits.locale_text: "So if I'd been born a minute earlier, I'd have been the animated corpse standing before you today?" {n}The young man recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything— why was she never told?"

"So if I'd been born a minute earlier, I'd have been the animated corpse standing before you today?" {n}The young man recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything— why was she never told?"

"So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

"So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

"So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

"So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

languages.text: « Alors, si j'étais né une minute plus tôt, c'est moi qui serais à la place de ce cadavre ambulant qui se tient devant vous aujourd'hui ? » {n}Mattis s'écarte brusquement de ses parents.{/n} « Mais pourquoi ne se souvient-elle de rien ? Pourquoi personne ne lui a jamais dit ce qui s'était passé ? »
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, si j'étais né une minute plus tôt, c'est moi qui serais à la place de ce cadavre ambulant qui se tient devant vous aujourd'hui ? » {n}Mattis s'écarte brusquement de ses parents.{/n} « Mais pourquoi ne se souvient-elle de rien ? Pourquoi personne ne lui a jamais dit ce qui s'était passé ? »

languages.text: «Así que, si hubiese nacido un minuto antes, ¿esa muerta en vida que tenéis delante habría sido yo?». {n}Mattis se aleja de sus padres.{/n} «¿Y por qué no recuerda nada? ¿Por qué no se lo ha contado nadie?».
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

traits.locale_text: «Así que, si hubiese nacido un minuto antes, ¿esa muerta en vida que tenéis delante habría sido yo?». {n}Mattis se aleja de sus padres.{/n} «¿Y por qué no recuerda nada? ¿Por qué no se lo ha contado nadie?».

languages.text: 「もし俺があと1分早く生まれていたら、今目の前にいるあの動く死体は俺だったのか？」{n}マティスは両親から少し離れる。{/n}「でも、どうして彼女は何も覚えていない？どうして何も言って来なかったんだ？」
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

traits.locale_text: 「もし俺があと1分早く生まれていたら、今目の前にいるあの動く死体は俺だったのか？」{n}マティスは両親から少し離れる。{/n}「でも、どうして彼女は何も覚えていない？どうして何も言って来なかったんだ？」

languages.text: “也就是说，假如当初早一分钟出生的人是我，今天就会轮到我像个活死人一样，站在你们面前了吗？”{n}马蒂斯看了一眼他的父母，退了一步。{/n}“可为什么她什么事情都不记得？为什么从来没有人告诉过她这一切？”
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，假如当初早一分钟出生的人是我，今天就会轮到我像个活死人一样，站在你们面前了吗？”{n}马蒂斯看了一眼他的父母，退了一步。{/n}“可为什么她什么事情都不记得？为什么从来没有人告诉过她这一切？”

languages.text: "Wäre ich also eine Minute früher geboren worden, würde heute ich als beseelter Leichnam vor Euch stehen?" {n}Mattis weicht von seinen Eltern zurück.{/n} "Aber warum erinnert sie sich an nichts? Warum wurde es ihr nie gesagt?"
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"

traits.locale_text: "Wäre ich also eine Minute früher geboren wurden, würde heute ich als beseelter Leichnam vor Euch stehen?" {n}Mattis weicht von seinen Eltern zurück.{/n} "Aber warum erinnert sie sich an nichts? Warum wurde es ihr nie gesagt?"

languages.text: "Yani bir dakika önce doğmuş olsaydım bugün önünüzde dikilen bu yaşayan ceset ben mi olacaktım?" {n}Mattis, ebeveynlerinden uzaklaşıyor.{/n} "Peki niçin hiçbir şeyi hatırlamıyor? Ona neden hiçbir şey anlatılmamış?"
languages.original_text: "So if I had been born a minute earlier, that animated corpse standing before you today would have been me?" {n}Mattis recoils from his parents.{/n} "But why doesn't she remember anything? Why was she never told?"
